title: I\'ve noticed that several Wilmington area aparment complexes have marked WPD vehicles in the parking lot. In particular, The Quad, near UNCW campus, always has a marked WPD cruiser in their parking lot and I\'ve never driven by when it was not there. Is this cruiser a take home vehicle or is there some other program where marked cruisers are left?
text:
Wilmington police officers are allowed to drive patrol cars home.
